### Describe the bug

A clear and concise description of what the bug is.

### Expected behavior
A clear and concise description of what you expected to happen.

### Screenshots
If applicable, add screenshots to help explain your problem.

### Environment
Relevant information about your environment:
- OS and version (e.g. Ubuntu 22.04, macOS 15, Windows 11)
- Node.js version

If one of the following is relevant to the error (such as in the error message) include:
- Network(s) used (e.g. BTC mainnet/testnet, BCH, ETH, DOGE, etc.)
- The package(s) version
- Database and version (e.g. MongoDB 7.x)
- Browser
- RAM
- CPU
- Disk size
- Disk Type (HD/SDD)
